text: Danial Faris (born 23 May 1997) is a Malaysian footballer who last playing as a goalkeeper for Balestier Khalsa. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |Geylang International |2018 |rowspan="2"|Singapore Premier League |2||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||2||0 |- |Balestier Khalsa |2019 |4||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||0||0||4||0 |- ! colspan=3 | Career total !6!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!6!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:Living people Category:Malaysian footballers Category:Singapore Premier League players Category:Geylang International FC players Category:Balestier Khalsa FC players Category:1997 births Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Danial Faris
